skills.skill_name: Name of the skill name/category or Science Practice etc...
skills.skill_description: Brief description of what this skill measures

subskills.subskill_description: Specific ability students demonstrate under this subskill

big_ideas.name: Big idea / Theme title
big_ideas.description: High-level unifying concept that recurs throughout the course

units.name: Unit title
units.developing_understanding: What conceptual understanding students should develop in this unit
units.building_practices: Science practices and/or Course skills emphasized in this unit
units.preparing_for_exam: How this unit prepares students for AP-style exam questions

topics.name: Topic title
suggested_subskill_codes: Relevant science practice / Course skills subskills

big_ideas.id: Big Idea or Enduring Understanding identifier found in the text
big_ideas.description: Description of the Big Idea or Enduring Understanding

learning_objectives.description: What students should be able to do after instruction

essential_knowledge.description: Key content knowledge students must understand for this objective

exam_sections.section: Exam section identifier (e.g., I or II)
exam_sections.question_type: Type of questions in this section
exam_sections.Number of Questions: Total number of questions in this section
descriptions: Contextual description of how this section assesses student learning
Descriptions of question types or expectations in this section
Any extra descriptions of weightage per unit

task_verbs.verb: Task verb used in exam questions
task_verbs.description: What students are expected to do when this verb is used
